text: Andrei Rares Toader (born 26 May 1997) is a Romanian athlete specialising in the shot put. He won several medals in age category competitions. His personal bests in the shot put are 20.54 metres outdoors (Pitesti 2016) and 19.80 metres indoors (Bucharest 2016). ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|2013 |rowspan=2|European Youth Olympic Festival |rowspan=2|Utrecht, Netherlands |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Shot put (5 kg) |18.53 m |- |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |Discus throw (1.5 kg) |56.49 m |- |rowspan=2|2014 |World Junior Championships |Eugene, United States |9th |Shot put (6 kg) |19.18 m |- |Youth Olympic Games |Nanjing, China |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Shot put (5 kg) |21.00 m |- |2015 |European Junior Championships |Eskilstuna, Sweden |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Shot put (6 kg) |20.78 m |- |2016 |European Championships |Amsterdam, Netherlands |6th |Shot put |20.26 m |} ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian male shot putters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2014 Summer Youth Olympics
title: Andrei Toader
